name: Crosley Furniture Griffith 3-Piece Metal Outdoor Conversation Seating Set

reviews.name: Crosley Furniture Griffith 3-Piece Metal Outdoor Conversation Seating Set
reviews.reviewText: A little tricky to assemble alone (they do recommend 2 people - and some real tools make it a lot easier) but other than that - GREAT. I got red and I love the set :-)
reviews.title: Even better than I hoped

reviews.name: Crosley Furniture Griffith 3-Piece Metal Outdoor Conversation Seating Set
reviews.reviewText: Free shipped in only three days. Well packaged, Quite easy to assemble by myself. extra fasteners included. Chairs & table are sturdy. Would buy other products from this manufacturer.
reviews.title: Very Satisfied

reviews.name: Crosley Furniture Griffith 3-Piece Metal Outdoor Conversation Seating Set
reviews.reviewText: Bought after season, but it is very nice. Would use my own tools. enjoy.
reviews.title: Crosley Seats & Neat Table
